content:
The following chunk introduces a comprehensive list of all Panda3D configuration variables as of June 2020, using version 1.10.4.1. This section serves as a reference guide for developers and users to understand and utilize these variables effectively. It notes that while the list is extensive, it may not include every possible variable and encourages further exploration through specific commands or source code inspection.

List of All Config Variables

The following is an incomplete list of config variables as of June 2020, using Panda3D 1.10.4.1. Some, but not all, variables were generated using this code:

python

ConfigVariableManager.getGlobalPtr().listVariables()
ConfigVariableManager.getGlobalPtr.listDynamicVariables()

cpp

ConfigVariableManager::get_global_ptr()->list_variables();
ConfigVariableManager::get_global_ptr()->list_dynamic_variables();

Bear in mind that this list includes configuration parameters that control functionality that isn't fully implemented yet. Ie, not all of these config variables are as useful as they sound.

You can use this command yourself, refer to the ~panda3d.core.ConfigVariableManager class , or check for ConfigVariable calls within the source code in case this list gets out of date.

List of Panda3D variables:
